# --- Standard Git ignores ---
.DS_Store
.vscode/
.idea/
.vs/
*.suo
*.user
*.VC.db
*.VC.opendb
*.opensdf
*.sdf
*.sln
*.bak
*.log
*.tlog
*.ipch
*.obj
*.pdb
*.exe
*.dll
*.lib
*.exp
*.aps
*.ncb
*.res
*.ilk
*.sbr
*.pch
*.pki
*.recipe
*.vst
*.target
*.natvis
*.uvproj
*.kpf
*.kfd
*.pvs
*.cache
*.code-workspace
*.vc.filters

# --- Unreal Engine specific ignores ---
# Binaries, Builds, Intermediate, Saved, DerivedDataCache are all generated files.
Binaries/
Build/
DerivedDataCache/
Intermediate/
Saved/

# Logs
*.log

# Unreal Engine project files that can be regenerated
*.xcodeproj
*.xcworkspace
*.uproject.bak

# Source control ignore for external editor tools (e.g., Rider)
.Rider/

# Cooked content
CookedContent/

# DDC files (may appear outside of DerivedDataCache)
*.ddc

# Plugin binaries and intermediates (if you are versioning plugins)
Plugins/*/Binaries/
Plugins/*/Intermediate/

# Exclude Visual Studio solution and project files IF you are regenerating them frequently
# If you want to commit your .sln and .vcxproj files, comment these out:
# *.sln
# *.vcxproj
# *.vcxproj.filters

# Mac artifacts
*.DS_Store
